greeting.text: Ah, a courier. *adjusts silk gloves* My employer has been observing your work. You show... potential. Are you interested in more exclusive contracts? The pay is substantially better than common street deliveries.

choices.text: I prefer to keep my independence.

explain_arrangements.text: Excellent. My employer requires absolute discretion and reliability. The letters you would carry are... sensitive. Personal correspondence between persons of quality. You would be compensated accordingly - 25 coins minimum per delivery.

choices.text: I can be discreet. I accept your terms.
For that level of discretion, I'd expect more.

deflect_identity.text: *slight smile* My employer values privacy above all else. Suffice to say they are a person of considerable influence who prefers to conduct certain affairs... quietly. That is all you need to know.

choices.text: Fair enough. What would you need from me?
I don't work for people I don't know.

disappointing.text: A pity. Independence is admirable, but it doesn't pay the bills. Should you reconsider, you know where to find me. Good day.

first_assignment.text: Very good. Your first task is simple - a letter to be delivered to a certain address in the Noble Quarter. No questions, no delays, no peeking. Return with proof of delivery, and there will be more work.

firm_terms.text: *raises eyebrow* You're bold. I like that. But the terms are non-negotiable. Twenty-five coins is already triple the standard rate. Take it or leave it.

choices.text: You're right. I'll take the original offer.

regretful.text: I understand your position, though I believe you're making a mistake. The shadows of anonymity can be more trustworthy than the bright light of reputation. Think on it.

your_loss.text: As you wish. But courier, a word of advice - in this city, sometimes the best opportunities come from the most mysterious sources. Don't let pride cost you prosperity.
